title: UpdateApi executor
description: Update the OpenAPI spec file and client

name.x-prompt: What name would you like to use for the library? (e.g. my-api)

directory.description: Directory where the library will be created

scope.x-prompt: What is the scope of the project? (e.g. @my-org)

spec.description: Path to the OpenAPI spec file (URL or local path)
spec.x-prompt: What is the path to the OpenAPI spec file? (URI or local file path)

client.description: The type of client to generate (@hey-api/client-fetch, @hey-api/client-axios, etc)

plugins.description: The plugins to be provided to @hey-api/openapi-ts

force.description: If true, the Client code will be regenerated even if the spec has not changed, also pass --skip-nx-cache to avoid caching issues
